name: Wander
abstract: Wander the world through the magic of VR. From the comfort of your living room you can teleport almost anywhere in the world!

detail.app_languages: English, Japanese, German, French, Korean, Spanish, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
- Added Zoom feature! Press the Joystick button to Zoom in where you are pointing.
- Added cross-play with Quest users
- Added option to block users in multiplayer
- Added teleportation markers in supported locations showing where you will end up when you teleport by pointing and clicking
- Added home environment including a map which tracks visited locations, photos displaying favorite locations, and an achievement wall!
- Virtual Keyboard adjusted to activate a click when the interact button is pressed down instead of released.
- Increased scroll speed on UI using the joystick and enabled faster scrolling by using both joystick simultaneously
- Adjusted drag threshold to make it easier to click without accidentally triggering a drag event on the UI
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4E
